SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT067
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message returns delivery subset criteria for the destination, as defined in the request for the FIN application. It is the response to an MT 047 Delivery Instructions Redefinition Request.
From: GPA To: User

SystemField.Name: value-date-ordering
SystemField.description:
Value date ordering, where:
a) Y = on
b) N = off

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: value-date-ordering
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Value date ordering, where:
a) Y = on
b) N = off

SystemField.Name: subset-sharing
SystemField.description:
Indicates the way in which selected FIN delivery subsets can be shared among multiple logical terminals of a destination, where:
N = subset sharing is not allowed
O = sharing allowed using overflow mechanism
L = sharing allowed using load-balancing mechanism
If this field is not present, then subset sharing is not allowed

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: subset-sharing
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Indicates the way in which selected FIN delivery subsets can be shared among multiple logical terminals of a destination, where:
N = subset sharing is not allowed
O = sharing allowed using overflow mechanism
L = sharing allowed using load-balancing mechanism
If this field is not present, then subset sharing is not allowed

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Subset Sharing value '" + $value + "'.Valid Subset Sharing values are : N,O,L."

SystemField.Name: delivery-subset-name
SystemField.description: Name assigned by the user to a delivery subset.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: delivery-subset-name
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Name assigned by the user to a delivery subset.

SystemField.Name: combined-criteria
SystemField.description:
Indicates the way in which fields are combined to form delivery subset selection logic, where:
0 = not combined
1 = branch code combined with other fields.
Can appear once for each occurrence of field 339.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: combined-criteria
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Indicates the way in which fields are combined to form delivery subset selection logic, where:
0 = not combined
1 = branch code combined with other fields.
Can appear once for each occurrence of field 339.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Combined Criteria value '" + $value + "'.Valid Combined Criteria values are : 0,1."

SystemField.Name: priority-category
SystemField.description: Priority and, optionally, message categories. Can appear up to three times for each occurrence of field 339.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: priority-category
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Priority and, optionally, message categories. Can appear up to three times for each occurrence of field 339.

SystemField.Name: msg-type-service-code-list
SystemField.description: List of up to 10 Message Types and/or Service Codes in any combination. Can appear once for each occurrence of field 344.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: msg-type-service-code-list
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: List of up to 10 Message Types and/or Service Codes in any combination. Can appear once for each occurrence of field 344.

SystemField.Name: branch-code-list
SystemField.description: List of up to 10 branch codes. Can appear once for each occurrence of field 344.Default branch code "XXX" is not allowed.Branch code must be a valid branch code when the MT 047 is issued.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: branch-code-list
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: List of up to 10 branch codes. Can appear once for each occurrence of field 344.Default branch code "XXX" is not allowed.Branch code must be a valid branch code when the MT 047 is issued.

SystemField.Name: field-list
SystemField.description:
List of up to 10 field tags.
13C is the only field currently supported.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: field-list
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
List of up to 10 field tags.
13C is the only field currently supported.
